channel.title: Auto-save and/or timed event?
channel.description: I've searched to no avail, and I'm looking for an autosave feature for my server. My server crashes every 10-15 minutes when too many users online. If autosave is not included, that is fine, I would just like a code to make a timed event. Would be nice as well if it could be commented out for future use if I were to use it for other things. Anyways, a reply with a link or an actual TuT would be helpful, thanks!

item.title: Auto-save and/or timed event?
item.dc:creator: @Sonixpber Sonixpber
item.description:
@Sonixpber wrote:

Like I said, I have looked for an auto-save and could not find one. You could be a little more helpful by posting the link rather than going on a rant about how everything I did was wrong… once again, I DID use the search feature and could not find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-save and/or timed event?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Ok,first,if your server is crashing because of too many people,then go to the tuts section-because someone made a guide on how to limit peopleon your server-so theres less lag,so theres less crashes.For auto-save,someone has also made a tut on how to put it in.

Look in the tuts section.

Read full topic
